statements: SELECT * FROM breach_notification;
SELECT business_name, breach_date FROM breach_notification WHERE notified = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(breach_id) FROM breach_notification WHERE affected_records > 1000;
SELECT business_name, breach_date, notified FROM breach_notification WHERE breach_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM breach_notification ORDER BY breach_date DESC, affected_records ASC;
SELECT breach_id, business_name, breach_date FROM breach_notification WHERE affected_records > 100 ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM breach_notification WHERE business_name LIKE '%Tech%' AND notified = TRUE;
SELECT breach_id, business_name, breach_date, affected_records FROM breach_notification WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY affected_records DESC;
SELECT business_name, MAX(affected_records) AS max_records FROM breach_notification GROUP BY business_name HAVING MAX(affected_records) > 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_breaches, AVG(affected_records) AS avg_records FROM breach_notification WHERE notified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM breach_notification;
SELECT breach_date, breached_data FROM breach_notification;
SELECT breach_id, notification_date FROM breach_notification ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM breach_report WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_details FROM breach_report ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM breach_notification WHERE breach_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY breach_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT breach_id, breached_data FROM breach_notification WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT notification_method, COUNT(*) FROM breach_notification GROUP BY notification_method HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT breach_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM breach_report INNER JOIN breach_notification ON breach_report.breach_id = breach_notification.breach_id WHERE breach_notification.notification_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT * FROM breach_notification INNER JOIN breach_report ON breach_notification.breach_id = breach_report.breach_id WHERE breach_notification.breach_id = 3 AND breach_report.report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, breach_type, description, date_occurred FROM data_breaches;
SELECT description, date_occurred, breach_type, id FROM data_breaches;
SELECT id, description FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Security';
SELECT * FROM breach_notifications WHERE notification_sent = TRUE;
SELECT action_taken, date_logged FROM breach_audit_log ORDER BY date_logged DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches;
SELECT breach_type, description FROM data_breaches WHERE date_occurred >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT b.id, b.breach_type, l.action_taken FROM data_breaches b JOIN breach_audit_log l ON b.id = l.breach_id;
SELECT b.breach_type, n.notification_sent FROM data_breaches b JOIN breach_notifications n ON b.id = n.breach_id WHERE n.date_sent BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT b.id, b.breach_type, l.action_taken, n.notification_sent FROM data_breaches b JOIN breach_audit_log l ON b.id = l.breach_id JOIN breach_notifications n ON b.id = n.breach_id;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches;
SELECT breach_name, breach_date FROM data_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, breach_date FROM breached_accounts WHERE notification_sent = true;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM breached_users GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_date, notification_message FROM breach_notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT breach_name, breach_date FROM data_breaches WHERE notification_sent = TRUE ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_name, breach_date, notification_sent FROM data_breaches WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT breach_name, COUNT(*) AS total_breaches FROM data_breaches GROUP BY breach_name HAVING total_breaches > 1;
SELECT breached_accounts.account_id, data_breaches.breach_name FROM breached_accounts JOIN data_breaches ON breached_accounts.breach_id = data_breaches.id ORDER BY breached_accounts.account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BreachNotification;
SELECT entity_name, breach_type FROM BreachNotification ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM NotificationContacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BreachedEntity WHERE entity_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT breach_id, response_type, response_details FROM BreachResponse WHERE response_type = 'Mitigation' ORDER BY breach_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BreachNotification ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, breach_description FROM BreachNotification WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT entity_name, entity_location FROM BreachedEntity WHERE entity_type = 'Organization';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM NotificationContacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT * FROM BreachEvidence WHERE evidence_type = 'Video Footage' AND evidence_details LIKE '%hacking%';
